name: Hocka
description:
W, A, S, D - Player 1 Arrow keys - Player 2 Editing your car: Unity like mov

- Right click, turn the camera.

- Right click + W, A, S, D, move the camera.

- Mouse wheel, drag

- Alt + right click, zoom.

- LShift speed mov.

Blender like mov <!--54-->

- Mouse wheel, turn the camera

- Mouse wheel + LShift, drag.

- Mouse wheel + LCtrl, zoom

- LShift speed mov.
